PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Interestingly , λ max was blue - shifted by -30 nm because of the low π-π stacking and the weak intermolecular interaction of PCZDTB compared with PQCDTB.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| λ max |
| -30 nm (blue-shift) |
| PCZDTB |
| PQCDTB |
| intermolecular interaction (of PCZDTB and PQCDTB) |
| π-π stacking |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| λ max |
| blue-shift (30 nm) |
| PCZDTB |
| PQCDTB |
| intermolecular interaction (between PCZDTB and PQCDTB) |
| π-π stacking |

Explanation:
- "Interestingly" and "was blue-shifted" are not material properties, but rather descriptive statements about the observation.
- "By" and "because of" are not material properties, but rather indicators of causation.
- "Low" and "weak" are not material properties, but rather descriptive statements about the intermolecular interaction and π-π stacking.
- "Nm" is a unit of measurement for nanometers, which is a property of the 30 nm blue-shift.

In this paragraph, the properties mentioned are the "λ max" value for two different compounds (PCZDTB and PQCDTB), and the fact that the "λ max" for PCZDTB is shifted by -30 nm compared to PQCDTB.

In this revised table, only the "λ max" values for PCZDTB and PQCDTB are included as they are the only entities in the paragraph that clearly refer to material properties with associated values.
